# f5xc_api_testing (Resource)

Manages a APITesting in F5 Distributed Cloud.

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_api_testing" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the APITesting. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the APITesting will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `custom_header_value` (String) Custom Header. Add x-f5-api-testing-identifier header value to prevent security flags on API testing traffic ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 128
- `domains` (Block List) Testing Environments. Add and configure testing domains and credentials Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true ves.io.schema.rules.repeated.max_items: 32 (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--domains))
- `every_day` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--every_day))
- `every_month` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--every_month))
- `every_week` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--every_week))
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

<a id="nestedblock--domains"></a>
### Nested Schema for `domains`

Optional:

- `allow_destructive_methods` (Boolean) Run API tests for destructive methods (e.g., DELETE, PUT).. Enable to allow API test to execute destructive methods. Be cautious as these can alter or delete data
- `credentials` (Block List) Credentials. Add credentials for API testing to use in the selected environment. Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--domains--credentials))
- `domain` (String) Domain. Add your testing environment domain. Be aware that running tests on a production domain can impact live applications, as API testing cannot distinguish between production and testing environments. Required: YES ves.io.schema.rules.message.required: true ves.io.schema.rules.string.max_len: 256 ves.io.schema.rules.string.vh_domain: true

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_api_testing.example system/example
```
